name: Flip That Table!
description:
*This game is in English language only!

Need to vent some anger? It's time to Flip That Table! In this exciting non-stop and action packed adventure, players have to flip tables of all shapes and colours as they run past series of obstacles.

WHAT'S AWATING IN THE WORLD OF TABLES
========================================
- Fast pace non-stop actions
- 89 unlockables
- 32 irresistible cute characters
- 9 colorful and vivid areas
- 4 game modes
- Stickers for iMessage

FOR YOUR BEST EXPERIENCE
===========================
Flip That Table! requires iOS 11 (or higher), and for optimal experience while flipping tables, we recommend you to use at least an iPhone 7, iPad Air 2 or iPad Mini 3.

Visit Flip That Tabl.e! websites for news and support
- https://joustplay.com
